item.description:
February's agenda is the same as January's. The focus of our discussion will be holidays and
festivals celebrated in the United States. This discussion is an excellent way to

* develop language skills, and
* gain a better understanding of American culture.

We will also discuss the direction of our Meetup group.

I look forward to meeting all the new members.


The South Station has a great area for meetings. I will save several tables near Au Bon Pan. South Station is within walking distance of Chinatown and is on the Red Line.

If the above link does not work, try typing in this URL. It's a great site that talks about the history of the South Station. http://www.pps.org/gp... (there are no spaces between any of the letters or numbers on this URL)


For more information, see http://www.pps.org/gp...

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston English as a Second Language February Meetup
